name: Vital Energy, Inc.
description: Vital Energy, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company based in the United States. Founded in 2017, the company primarily focuses on acquiring, developing, and producing oil and natural gas resources in the Permian Basin, one of the most prolific oil-producing regions in the country. Vital Energy is committed to efficient and sustainable energy production, employing advanced technologies and best practices to minimize environmental impact while maximizing resource recovery. The company's operations are guided by a strategic vision of growth through acquisitions and organic development, ensuring a robust portfolio of high-quality assets. Vital Energy emphasizes responsible resource management and community engagement, aiming to create value for its shareholders while also contributing positively to the communities in which it operates. With a dedicated team of industry professionals, Vital Energy is well-positioned to capitalize on opportunities in the dynamic energy market and drive long-term shareholder value.

seo.meta_title: Vital Energy, Inc. | Independent Oil and Natural Gas Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Vital Energy, Inc., an independent oil and gas company focusing on sustainable energy production in the Permian Basin. Learn about our operations and commitment to responsible resource management.

faq.question: What does Vital Energy focus on?
faq.answer: Vital Energy focuses on the exploration and production of oil and natural gas, primarily in the Permian Basin.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vital Energy?
faq.answer: Jason L. Smith is the CEO of Vital Energy, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Vital Energy headquartered?
faq.answer: Vital Energy is headquartered in Midland, Texas, USA.
